request_sync.name: Request sync
request_sync.description: Sends a request_sync command to Google.

agent_user_id.name: Agent user ID
agent_user_id.description: Only needed for automations. Specific Home Assistant user ID (not username, ID in Settings > People > Users > under username) to sync with Google Assistant. Not needed when you use this action through Home Assistant frontend or API. Used in automation, script or other place where context.user_id is missing.
